statements: DELETE FROM Security_Logs WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SecurityAlerts WHERE handled = FALSE;
DELETE FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_date < '2021-06-30';
DELETE FROM SecurityAlerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious Activity' AND alert_date >= '2021-07-01' AND handled = FALSE;
DELETE FROM wallet_security WHERE wallet_name = 'Secure Wallet';
DELETE FROM wallet_security WHERE wallet_owner = 'Alice' AND wallet_balance < 1000;
DELETE FROM wallet_transactions WHERE user_id = 101 AND transaction_type = 'withdraw';
